borsch.name: Borscht
borsch.description: Traditional Ukrainian beet soup with meat and vegetables.
recipe: Boil the meat until tender, remove and cut.
Add chopped potatoes to the broth, cook for 10 minutes.
Add shredded cabbage, cook for another 5 minutes.
Sauté beets with carrots and onions, add tomato paste.
Add the sautéed vegetables to the soup, cook for 10 minutes.
Add the meat, season with salt and pepper, finish cooking.

plov.name: Plov
plov.description: Central Asian rice dish with tender meat and aromatic spices.
recipe: Add chopped onions and carrots, sauté.
Pour in water, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked.

olivier.name: Olivier Salad
olivier.description: Classic Russian salad with potatoes, vegetables, eggs, and mayonnaise.

pasta.name: Pasta Carbonara
pasta.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
recipe: Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Mix pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.

caesar.name: Caesar Salad
caesar.description: Fresh romaine lettuce with creamy dressing and crispy croutons.
recipe: Mix dressing with romaine and croutons.

chicken_potato.name: Chicken with Potatoes
